snippet: KAYE--Judith. The Legal Aid Society mourns the loss of Judge Kaye, a brilliant jurist, responsible for ground breaking decisions who will always be remembered for her great leadership, creative court reforms and for protecting the rights of the most vulnerable. She was a former Director of the Society, serving from 1977 to 1983. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAYE--Judith. The Legal Aid Society mourns the loss of Judge Kaye, a brilliant jurist, responsible for ground breaking decisions who will always be remembered for her great leadership, creative court reforms and for protecting the rights of the most vulnerable. She was a former Director of the Society, serving from 1977 to 1983. 1/3
